attributes.action: Cut the budget on excessive, controlling security measures (e.g. CCTV invasion) and use it to help the NHS with its debt instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cut the budget used on CCTV cameras which are not necessary (for example inside university lecture rooms and residence halls); even though some of the cameras will help the citizens feel safe, a great amount of CCTVs in public places have no other use than to control what the people are doing. Instead, use part of the CCTV budget to help the NHS reduce the damage caused by its 650 million pound debt (service cuts, declining quality of hospitals, job cuts, etc).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
